hero.title: Authentic Italian Cuisine
hero.subtitle: A unique dining experience that combines tradition, flavor, and passion in every dish.

about.title: Our Story
about.description: Since 2010, Cuore & Cucina has been a piece of Italy in Vila Velha, bringing traditional recipes and love for Italian gastronomy.

tradition.title: Family Tradition
tradition.description: Our recipes are passed down from generation to generation, keeping the authentic tradition of Italian cuisine alive.

ingredients.title: Selected Ingredients
ingredients.description: We use only high-quality ingredients, imported directly from Italy or selected from local producers.

ambience.title: Welcoming Atmosphere
ambience.description: Our space was designed to provide a cozy and authentic experience, just like Italian family restaurants.

team.title: Passionate Team
team.description: Our team consists of professionals passionate about Italian gastronomy and dedicated to offering the best service.

footer.description: Bringing authentic Italian cuisine to Vila Velha since 2010.
